DOC.brief_summary: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy liposome-encapsulated ropivacaine formulation dental anesthesia .
DOC.detailed_description: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy liposome-encapsulated 0 , 5 % ropivacaine dental anesthesia maxillary infiltration .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers free cardiac , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , neurological , gastrointestinal haematological disease , psychiatric disorder allergy local anesthetic
